title: IT Development Manager (e-Commerce)
company_info: TWG Tea Company Pte Ltd implies a long history of perpetual exploration and creativity… Offering over 800 teas from 36 different countries including countless exclusive teas all hand blended in Singapore, TWG Tea has one of the largest selections in the world. We create daring and exclusive blends, using the most fragrant flowers and fruits from Europe, the most exotic spices, and only the finest, single estate teas from remote and mysterious regions of the world. TWG Tea sources, blends, designs, manufactures, packs and distributes high quality loose and packaged teas, teabags, tea accessories, tea infused patisseries and gourmet products, showcased in our own directly operated and uniquely designed TWG Tea salons, boutiques and retail counters, and distributed to a network of wholesale luxury hotel and restaurant customers throughout Asia, the Middle East, North America and Europe. TWG Tea is expanding its business and is looking for energetic, innovative and committed candidates with relevant experience to join us
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Summary
In this exciting opportunity, you will lead and expand a team of web-developers to meet the needs of our growing e-Commerce business through continuous enhancements. You will be the front-line IT support to the e-business team members in ensuring all critical issues are resolved timely.

Primary Relationships
The position reports directly to the Head of IT. Within the organization, this position has primary working relationships with IT Support Team and Digital Sales and Marketing Team at TWG Tea headquarters. Outside the organization, the position coordinates primarily with platform vendors and partners.

Responsibilities:
Formulate support and development methodologies and enforce conformance by all parties
Responsible for ensuring on-time delivery of all digital marketing campaigns and initiatives over Omni-Channel platforms and global marketplaces from a technical angle
Responsible for working closely with e-business team members to transpose digital business needs into action plans, and drive the deliverables to succession
Generate meaningful insights through data-driven analysis and post-mortem reviews
Continuous innovation on ways to enhance the worldwide digital presence and customers’ online (UI/UX) experience, social listening, SEO and other digital online
Lead and coordinate with various departments and business partners/ platform vendors to meet target objectives globally, including make proposals to streamline internal processes
Responsible for infrastructure scalability and able to cope with seasonable traffic requirements
Review and manage partner/vendor contracts, ensuring vendors meet their Service Levels
Build test case scenarios and formulate roll-out plans to ensure quality delivery from vendors, ensure uninterrupted deployment as well as ‘go-live’ strategies

Requirements:
Diploma/Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related disciplines
Minimally 3 years’ experience in leading a support and development team
Must have eCommerce project development and implementation experience using Agile Methodology.
Good track record of product management and development covering multiple platforms, but not limited to, e-Commerce, m-Commerce/Mobile App, CRM, SEO, Online Marketing etc
Familiar with maintaining Cloud infrastructure like AWS and Microsoft Azure
Minimally 5 years’ experience in an eCommerce environment, always updated with digital news preferably in the online luxury space
Experienced working with online platform giants like Amazon, Google, Zalora etc is a bonus
Minimally 3 years’ experience in web and Mobile App development, CMS platform management, integrations with databases, CRM and ERP systems
Possess hands-on skills in web/mobile programming languages like C++, HTML, CSS, Xamarin, React Native on both Android and iOS platforms
Must have experienced in administrative setup and maintaining CICD using tools like JIRA software management, service management, Github, AppVeyor, Jenkines, Azure Devops, etc
Must have experience managing source codes and change management using Githubs/ Gitlabs, Bit Torrents, etc
Ability to be hands-on to guide and mentor the team of developers to collectively meet targets
Possess outstanding leadership skills with great communication skills to lead and influence multiple cross-functional teams, management and partners
Energetic, independent and self-motivated individual with good business acumen
Strong communication skills with excellent command of English
A plus point to be fluent in spoken Chinese or French (in order to liaise with TWG Tea partners in North-Asia and Europe)

Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Please apply with a detailed resume indicating reasons for leaving, last drawn salary, expected salary and date of availability.

company_info: MindFlex Education Pte Ltd is rapidly-growing Educational Business in Singapore. We are currently Singapore's #1 provider for all private & home-related tuition services in Singapore. employment_type: Contract, Flexi-work, Freelance, Full Time, Internship/Attachment, Part Time, Permanent, Temporary
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Hi! Our awesome company is looking for University Interns who have experience in Web Development, & able to commit for a Full-Time Internship of 3 months or more (longer durations preferred).
About Us:
MindFlex Education's internship programme aims to provide internships which are fulfilling, as well as practical in real-world situations
Our office culture is fun, young & encouraging. We take our work, as well as our fun seriously
We provide full-time job opportunities for interns who have excelled in their internship
Enjoy a modern office environment with exciting facilities, such as a PS5, Full-Sized Pool Table, High-End Karaoke System & more
Close-knit team of 15-20 pax, strictly NO office politics, NO over-time culture, NO bring-work-home culture
Web Developer Intern Roles and Responsibilities:
Improve & automate company's business process through creation of new PHP web applications & improvement of existing code.
Review of company's existing process systems to improve UI/UX for both internal and external users.
Be involved in improvement of company's iOS & Android application
Connecting SQL Databases to developed web applications
Review and improve company's current cronjobs and APIs for both internal and external software.
Ensure that new projects are moved from development phase to production phase smoothly, and are both desktop & mobile friendly.
Spearhead development of new landing pages for company's website on WordPress platform, with usage of HTML & CSS code involved.
Modify and improve current landing pages for company's website, with the addition of new functionalities.
Data mining of websites and database for information to be used in company's IT projects.
Learning Outcomes & Objectives:
Intern will be exposed to the movement of IT projects from development phase to production phase in a systematic & meticulous manner.
Intern will have the first-hand experience of building code which can be translated into real-world business usage, to solve actual business problems.
Intern will learn how to manage expectations of different stakeholders, in particular balancing between "design wants" of the company and limitations of existing web platforms.
Intern will gain valuable first-hand experience of developing mobile applications, as well as creating new website landing pages from scratch in a professional setting.
Intern will gain insights on mining data content and using it for real-life application purposes.
Intern will be able to review and suggest opinions on how certain UI/UX interfaces of the company can be improved, and carry out plans for improvement.
Intern will also be able to review codes and script written by previous developers; learning from examples and improvement on existing code.
Intern will also have access to a "senior developer" who will be able to answer queries & troubleshoot whever necessary
Requirements:
Has to be a current University Undergraduate in a computing-related course
Possess some previous experience with website designing / programming
Proficient with PHP, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Languages
A good team player who is able to communicate effectively with various internal and external stakeholders
Ability to think critically and be able to suggest possible improvements to existing company software systems
Possess adequate problem-solving skills to tackle day-to-day issues independently
Working Hours, Location & Remuneration:
5 Days Work Week, Weekdays 9.00am - 6.30pm
Midview City (Sin Ming Lane)
Closest MRTs: Bright-Hill MRT (Door-Step), Bishan / Marymount MRT (nearby)
$1,000 - $1,200/Month
Interns will also be given several days of paid leave (depending on internship period)
Why Choose Us:
Fun Working Environment with No Office Politics!
Casual Working Attire, Relaxed Setting
Close-Knit Team of 15-20 Pax
Spacious Office with Modern & Fun Entertainment Facilities (Pool Table, Playstation 5, Karaoke Set, Board Games...etc)
Company Meals / Outings / Events / Bonding Activities
Great & Enjoyable Company Culture
Many of our interns have also converted to full-time & contract positions after their internship as they thoroughly enjoyed their learning experience with us
Conveniently located with New Bright Hill MRT at Doorstep
Application:
Submit an e-mail application with Resume/CV to mindflex.recruitment@gmail.com with Email Title "Web Developer Intern Application"
Please ensure to include the following in Email and attached documents:
1. Earliest Available Start-Date for Internship
2. Available Duration for Internship
3. Suitable Profile Picture of Yourself
4. Is Undertaking The Internship for A Course Requirement, or Self-Improvement
Others:
Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for a short interview over Zoom or Face-to-Face
Signing of Non-Compete contract will be required upon successful selection

As a trainee, you will undergo a comprehensive training program to learn and develop skills in Agile development methodologies, Unified Modeling Language (UML), Domain-Driven Design (DDD), and Laravel web application development.
Responsibilities:
Participate in an intensive training program to learn and understand Agile development practices, UML modeling techniques, and principles of Domain-Driven Design.
Collaborate with senior developers and mentors to assist in the design, development, and testing of Laravel-based web applications.
Gain hands-on experience in developing and maintaining clean, well-structured, and efficient code following best coding practices.
Assist in writing technical documentation to capture application design, code structure, and functionality.
Work with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and contribute to translating them into technical solutions.
Perform unit testing and assist in conducting code reviews to ensure the quality and robustness of the developed applications.
Continuously learn and stay up-to-date with the latest trends, tools, and technologies in web development and software engineering.
Requirements:
Education: A diploma in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field is mandatory. Candidates with relevant certifications or demonstrated practical knowledge will also be considered.
Strong Interest: A passion for software development, web technologies, and a keen interest in learning Agile development, UML, DDD, and Laravel.
Basic Programming Knowledge: Familiarity with at least one programming language (e.g., PHP, Java, C#, Python) is a plus, but not required.
Communication Skills: Good verbal and written communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and stakeholders.
Problem-Solving Abilities: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify issues and propose creative solutions.
Adaptability: Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and dynamic work environment, and a willingness to learn and grow in a team-oriented setting.
Self-Motivation: Proactive and self-driven individual with a strong desire to improve technical skills and contribute to real-world projects.
Collaboration: A positive attitude and willingness to work collaboratively with a diverse team of professionals.
Note: This position is for individuals with limited professional experience in Agile development, UML, DDD, and Laravel. Trainees will receive comprehensive training and mentoring during their initial period of employment.
If you are eager to kick-start your career as an Agile UML DDD Laravel Developer, and you possess a passion for software development and a hunger for continuous learning, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
